Section: 3531. Return; several defendants; conviction of less offense; poll of jury-(Rule)
Content: See Federal Rules of Criminal ProcedureVerdict to be unanimous; return; several defendants; disagreement; conviction of less offense; poll of jury, Rule 31.(June 25, 1948, ch. 645, 62 Stat. 837.)

Section: 3532. Setting aside verdict of guilty; judgment notwithstanding verdict-(Rule)
Content: See Federal Rules of Criminal ProcedureSetting aside verdict of guilty on motion for judgment of acquittal, entering of such judgment, or ordering new trial; absence of verdict, Rule 29(b).(June 25, 1948, ch. 645, 62 Stat. 837.)
